attributes.action: Allow Men To Opt Out Of Parenthood and Financial Responsibility.
attributes.additional_details:
For total equality between the sexes allowing men to opt out of parenthood and absolving all support and rights to that effect make things fair.

When a woman falls pregnant, SHE can choose whether to keep the baby, or go through an abortion or put the baby up for adoption, thus ultimately 'opting out' of parenthood. 

A man in this situation has no such right to opt out of parenthood. He has to accept the woman's decision and his life will be impacted by the woman's decision.
attributes.background:
Make the Right to Choose Equal for Both Men And Woman.
If a woman has the right to Choose so should men.
I want the government to discuss the changing Of The Law to Allow Men the right to choose if they want to be a farther. And if they don't allow them to choose to sign all rights and dutys away
